replies.body:
Revert jungle experience. 

How is it fair to be 2-3 levels behind solo laners despite having equal or greater cs?

I've been maining jungle for years, but now I genuinely hate the position. So does the everyone who's forced into playing this dogshit role.

If you queue autofill, you'll be jungling.

Nobody wants to farm all fucking game just to stay 2 levels behind the enemy top/mid who'll come invade and pick up a free 300g.

I liked your comment because I too, wishes that junglers get more reward. However since blue/gromp and red/raptors can be taken together, and scuttle gives resources when killed, it's not that hard for me, as a jungler to balance between objectives, farming, vision and ganking. Drake and herald can be easily soloed as well so while I do wish for a buff, I think that the current meta is not hell for junglers per se.
{{champion:103}} Fix client instead of releasing champions and stat changing cause how are players going to be able to play if your client is shit.

I'll mention first that those are entirely different teams. 

Regardless, as far as I'm aware the major issues have been resolved. If you're still experiencing client issues then I'd recommend posting in Help and Support or submitting a Support Ticket to see about getting them resolved on your end too.

Aphelios needs alot more damage nerfs he has a ban rate of 64%. When he is played he can easily 1v3 with any combination of weapons and requires no thought or strategy to do so. He has an overloaded kit with ridiculous numbers that gives him the edge over any other adc. His passive free stats allows him to stay in lane longer and dominate while other adc champions need to recall and shop for items to close the stat difference. The only way to play against an aphelios is to to get your jungler to camp bot and hope you can somehow kill him repeatedly and end the game early enough that he doesnt get back into the game.

Not sure where else to put this, but: Riot what the HELL were you thinking in making it MANDATORY for players to play RANKED games in quests? 90+% of all prior quests were obtainable in PvE, and of the less than 10% which did require PvP, they could be done in Normals. Requiring we play in an environment many people such as myself deliberately avoid, for the sake of completing a quest? Very very very upsetting, because I have to choose between subjecting myself to that environment I deliberately avoid, or missing out on 100% completion for the questline.

Fix the client please. It is annoying dealing with the rune page bug that stops you from selecting anything besides already made rune pages, as well as messages that count as not read even though i just read them (unless i msg the person back...) and the client getting laggier and laggier until i re-log sometimes and the after game lobby breaking so i cant tell who is still in the lobby and the home page button loading only a black screen when clicked unless you go into another tab first and the client not showing everyone in the pre-made lobby who is actually in the lobby and the client being disconnected unexpectedly. I'm almost certain there are more issues with the client I have forgotten, but seriously, this is beyond a joke at this point. 

FIX THE CLIENT BUGS!

> Freljord Sylas will be available on January 11, 2020. Sett and Mecha Kingdoms Sett will be available on January 15, 2020. Mecha Kingdoms Garen Prestige Edition, Draven, Garen, Leona, and Jax will be available on January 16, 2020.

Why are all of these skins (and Sett) being released on random arbitrary days? Sett has been on PBE for a month and we're still not even getting it today.

Champions are rarely released on the actual patch day. As I understand it, it's largely to let the patch itself settle and ensure there aren't any major issues before also throwing a new champion into the mix.

As for the skins, unsure why the Sylas one is so early, I would imagine it's to get people excited about him once the season starts now that he's had some pretty heavy QoL tweaks. 

As for the others, the Night and Dawn event doesn't end until the 14th, and presumably, there will be a Mecha Kingdoms event to go with the new releases, so they can't overlap. Given that Sett is "The Boss", I imagine him releasing a day earlier is a nod to his lore, possibly combined with some other practical reason that eludes me.
happy that your giving us some hp regen back on support items good work riot
PLEASE BUFF AATROX OR FIX HIS PASSIVE PLEASE! PLZ WATCH HASHINSHIN SUGGESTIONS! {{champion:266}} {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

riot why the fk would you change sprit guard udyr skin with out even saying anything in the patch notes i paid 30 dollar for that skin to be able to play udyr smoothly only bc of the claws that u would get by leveling up your tiger stance to lvl 5 and now u made it so u can get them level 16 i mean u guys dont give a shit about this champion for so long no buffs no nothing and out of no where u change the skin revert the changes please and btw udyrs original skin looks 10 years old just putting that out there
theres a champ in game that does damage when landing consistant skill shots at a set distance, sounds op
where r the singed buffs honest
What happened to Ezreal Q buff? big sad
Still no sign of Draven's axe fixes... been bugged for so long now.
Where's ARURF its been on the PBE For a month now!
